name: Modules.Cloud.SocialIntegrations
summary: Provides methods for access ArrowDB social integrations.

methods.name: externalAccountLink
methods.summary: Associate an external account with an existing ArrowDB user account.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Social Integration: Link an external account for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the users property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: externalAccountLogin
methods.summary: Login to ArrowDB using an external account such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
methods.description:
See Social Integration: Login with external account for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the users property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: externalAccountUnlink
methods.summary: Disassociate an external account from a ArrowDB user account.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Social Integration: Unlink an external account for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the users property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: searchFacebookFriends
methods.summary: Returns a list of the current user's Facebook friends who are also using this application.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Social Integration: Find Facebook Friends for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the users property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
